__init__(self, val=0, next=None):\r\n#         self.val = val\r\n#         self.next = next\r\n\r\ndef deleteDuplicates(head: Optional[ListNode]) -> Optional[ListNode]:\r\n        # empty or single item list\r\n        if not head or not head.next:\r\n                return head\r\n\r\n        cur_node = head\r\n\r\n        while cur_node.next:\r\n                nxt_node = cur_node.next\r\n\r\n                if cur_node.val == nxt_node.val:\r\n                        cur_node.next = nxt_node.next\r\n                else:\r\n                        cur_node = cur_node.next\r\n                        nxt_node = nxt_node.next\r\n\r\n        return head\n","language":"py","meta":""},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"pre","props":{},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"code","props":{"__ignoreMap":""},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"span","props":{"class":"line","line":1},"children":[{"type":"element","tag":"span","props":{"class":"ct-188924"},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"#
